nodes.text: R5-B0019 was an R5 series astromech droid that once spent time among the droids carried inside a Jawa sandcrawler on Tatooine. The droid was colored in black and white, and included a Burtt acoustic signaller.
This Halloween-themed droid was a toy made available exclusively from Disney Parks in 2019. Similarly-named Halloween-themed droids R2-B00, R3-B0017, and R4-B0018 were released in previous years.
